helpText: ã_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________Ç.

generic.title: ã_Error updating categories__________________________Ç
generic.message: ã_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________Ç.

maxDepthExceeded.title: ã_Error updating categories__________________________Ç
maxDepthExceeded.message: ã_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________Ç.

destinationHasSameName.title: ã_Error updating categories__________________________Ç
destinationHasSameName.message: ã_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________Ç.

noSchema.title: ã_Schema not found_________________Ç
noSchema.message: ã_Item schema not found for user_________________Ç.

maxCharacter.title: ã_Error updating categories__________________________Ç
maxCharacter.message: ã_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________Ç.

deleteInUseCategory.title: ã_Delete category________________Ç
deleteInUseCategory.message: ã_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________Ç.

custom.title: ã_Custom categories__________________Ç
custom.message: ã_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________Ç.

arcgis.title: ã_ArcGIS categories__________________Ç
arcgis.message: ã_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________Ç.

iso.title: ã_ISO categories_______________Ç
iso.message: ã_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________Ç.

inspire.title: ã_INSPIRE categories___________________Ç
inspire.message: ã_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________Ç.
